name: EFC Figshare Cross-Reference
description: Cross-links between Figshare DOIs, conceptual definitions, and schema references for the Energy-Flow Cosmology framework.

dataset.name: Energy-Flow Cosmology (Core Framework)
dataset.about: Foundational framework connecting structure, dynamics, and cognition through thermodynamic reasoning.

dataset.name: Grid–Higgs Framework (GHF)
dataset.about: Describes the coupling between entropic gradients and structural emergence via the Grid–Higgs interaction.

dataset.name: Halo Model of Entropy (HME)
dataset.about: Applies thermodynamic entropy gradients to model galactic and cosmic halo formation.
